name: bloom-conductor-workspace
description: Bloom Nucleus Workspace - Installer and Launcher

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix workspace && npm install --prefix setup
scripts.build:all: npm run build:workspace && npm run build:setup
scripts.version:all: npm run version:workspace && npm run version:setup
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rimraf workspace/node_modules setup/node_modules
